docs:
# Getting started with Zoho CRM
To use any of the above modules, you need to have Zoho CRM accessible from the Internet and a Zoho CRM account. If you do not have Zoho CRM accessible publicly or you do not have a Zoho CRM account, then contact your system administrator or Zoho CRM administrator.

## Connecting the Zoho CRM service to Integromat
To connect your Zoho CRM account to Integromat, follow the general instructions for [Connecting to services](https://support.integromat.com/hc/en-us/articles/360001990194#create-a-connection). Once the connection is established, you can continue creating your scenario.

## Error AUTHENTICATION_FAILURE
Zoho CRM doesn't allow creating more accounts in the “offline" mode. If you get the AUTHENTICATION_FAILURE error during creating accounts, you have to delete old accounts. 
Open [Zoho Accounts](https://accounts.zoho.com) -> Sessions -> Connected Apps and delete Integromat app.

        "name": "module",

        "name": "limit",
        "type": "uinteger",
        "label": "Limit",
        "default": 100,
        "required": true
    }
]

UploadAttachment.name: UploadAttachment
UploadAttachment.label: Upload an Attachment
UploadAttachment.description: Uploads an attachment to a record.
UploadAttachment.expectJsonc:
[
	{
		"name": "module",
		"type": "select",
		"label": "Module",
		"required": true,
		"dynamic": true,
		"editable": true,
		"options": [
			{"label": "Leads", "value": "Leads"},
			{"label": "Accounts", "value": "Accounts"},
			{"label": "Contacts", "value": "Contacts"},
			{"label": "Deals", "value": "Deals"},
			{"label": "Campaigns", "value": "Campaigns"},
			{"label": "Tasks", "value": "Tasks"},
			{"label": "Cases", "value": "Cases"},
			{"label": "Events", "value": "Events"},
			{"label": "Calls", "value": "Calls"},
			{"label": "Solutions", "value": "Solutions"},
			{"label": "Products", "value": "Products"},
			{"label": "Vendors", "value": "Vendors"},
			{"label": "Price Books", "value": "Price_Books"},
			{"label": "Quotes", "value": "Quotes"},
			{"label": "Sales Orders", "value": "Sales_Orders"},
			{"label": "Purchase Orders", "value": "Purchase_Orders"},
			{"label": "Invoices", "value": "Invoices"},
			{"label": "Custom", "value": "Custom", "nested": [
				{
					"name": "customModule",
					"type": "text",
					"label": "Custom module",
					"required": true
				}
			]},
			{"label": "Notes", "value": "Notes"}
		]
	},
	{
		"name": "record_id",
		"type": "text",
		"label": "Object ID",
		"required": true
	},
	{
		"name": "fileName",
		"label": "File name",
		"type": "filename",
		"required": true,
		"semantic": "file:name"
	},
	{
		"name": "data",
		"label": "Data",
		"type": "buffer",
		"required": true,
		"semantic": "file:data"
	}
]
